fields.description:
This issue was found in the instance churn test in CI.

{{ceph-rbd}} was being used as the storage-backend.

{noformat}
2015-04-06 05:16:00  INFO 000008902 doRunInstance            | [i-5cd1f488] running instance cores=1 disk=5 memory=256 vlan=-1 net=-1 priMAC=d0:0d:5c:d1:f4:88 privIp=10.111.31.202 plat=linux kernel=(null) ramdisk=(null)
2015-04-06 05:16:00 DEBUG 000008902 vbr_legacy               | [i-5cd1f488]                VBR[0] type=ephemeral id=none dev=sdb size=3221225472 format=ext3 none
2015-04-06 05:16:00 DEBUG 000008902 vbr_legacy               | [i-5cd1f488]                VBR[1] type=machine id=emi-cb9a0080 dev=sda size=2147483648 format=none http://imaging@10.111.5.121:8773/services/objectstorage/18f412-download-manifests-v2/DM-r-90f132ee?Expires=1428333356&AWSAccessKeyId=AKIQZHDTUH7IPMPFQQMH&x-amz-security-token=ZXVjYQABk1UWwJRgJNiXMZ3RfqzNou0fD3ifmklDkyZbBst5gQouQLW5trZ11msPjzKRLrbV%2F%2BD4zWFaEFfVjEDlLj%2BoNznekfy2%2Bpew%2BC%2B7%2FQBddOEZ9MXWdppJ4d5ZFV%2FKuI8zpD9%2F%2B395o5%2FZfJWRjj%2Bz7UFLjzAtyUdlbwo%2BoGfa8xUMl2UZqBo8NVW0%2Fvvj59ItewMxPRSymFj11%2B2JtQDxJu3vywJdHq1%2BdAlez74ivqVND9Zyz%2BPX3A%3D%3D&Signature=8WoLLC8r%2Ft8iOXO4w8vYoTBNQik%3

2015-04-06 05:16:00 DEBUG 000027875 startup_thread           | [i-5cd1f488] spawning startup thread
2015-04-06 05:16:00  INFO 000027875 ensure_directories_exist | creating path /var/lib/eucalyptus/instances/work/AIDOT4X6PR6E2H60MP1PH/i-5cd1f488
2015-04-06 05:16:00 DEBUG 000027875 diskutil_ch              | ch(own|mod) '/var/lib/eucalyptus/instances/work/AIDOT4X6PR6E2H60MP1PH/i-5cd1f488' *.root 771

2015-04-06 05:16:01 DEBUG 000027875 change_state             | [i-5cd1f488] state change for instance: Staging -> Shutoff (Pending)

2015-04-06 05:16:01  INFO 000008902 doAssignAddress          | [i-bf6a6e98] assigning address: [10.111.31.196]
2015-04-06 05:16:01 DEBUG 000008902 doAssignAddress          | [i-bf6a6e98] invoked (publicIp=10.111.31.196)
2015-04-06 05:16:01 DEBUG 000008902 doBroadcastNetworkInfo   | invoked
2015-04-06 05:16:01 DEBUG 000008902 doBroadcastNetworkInfo   | decoding/writing buffer to (//var/lib/eucalyptus/global_network_info.xml)
2015-04-06 05:16:04 ERROR 000008984 libvirt_err_handler      | libvirt: Domain not found: no domain with matching name 'i-5cd1f488' (code=42)
2015-04-06 05:16:04  INFO 000008984 monitoring_thread        | [i-5cd1f488] cleaning up state for instance
2015-04-06 05:16:04 DEBUG 000008984 diskutil_ch              | ch(own|mod) '/var/lib/eucalyptus/instances/work/AIDOT4X6PR6E2H60MP1PH/i-5cd1f488/instance.xml' eucalyptus.* 660
2015-04-06 05:16:04 DEBUG 000008984 blobstore_delete_nonblob | [i-5cd1f488] removing instance.xml
2015-04-06 05:16:04 DEBUG 000008984 change_state             | [i-5cd1f488] state change for instance: Shutoff -> Teardown (Teardown)
{noformat}

In the test, this image was used to run several instance on the same node before and after this failure.

(sos report attached)
fields.summary: Running instance failed as OSG server responded with HTTP code 403
fields.environment:
storage-backend: ceph-rbd

10.111.5.121	CENTOS	6.5	64	REPO	[CLC]

comments.body:
NC should retry.

This could also be that the token is no longer valid.

Saw this issue in instance scale testing for 4/1000 instances:

{code}

not sure if the URL truncation at 512 characters is for display or is related to the problem.
The attached patch fixes the URL truncation issue.
In progress now, the proposed URL length fix will land today.

The proposed fix is in master branch. If you continue to see sporadic run failures please let me know. The fix handles the case where the URL of the download manifest is > 512 characters and was being truncated. To test and confirm, register an image with a long name (e.g 100+ chars including the bucket name) and run it. It should succeed.

Tested this fix to confirm EUCA-11360 has been resolved.  

*Test Results*
* paravirtual instance-store backed instance reached 'running' state; successfully SSH'd into instance
* BundleInstance of the paravirtual instance-store backed instance completed successfully
* Instance launched from bundled paravirtual instance-store backed instance reached 'running' state; successfully SSH'd into instance

*Test Environment*
* [hspencer-123|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Master/1231/]

*Steps*
# Set up Eucalyptus 4.2.0 cloud from source (commit 52185e35b0727eb3a91e132b09a64a7f2eb24daa) -  [hspencer-123|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Master/1231/]
# Downloaded Ubuntu Trusty tar-gzipped package to bundle, upload and register a paravirt EMI:
